content:
The same applies to textures, which are cached in the .TexturePool, and fonts, which are cached in the .FontPool.

python

Reference Cycles with Python Tags

When using Python tags to store references to Panda3D objects, it is easy to accidentally create a reference cycle that Python's garbage collector cannot detect. This scenario is explained on the page subclassing.

Removing Custom Class Instances

When using custom Python classes that manage Panda3D objects, there are a few things to be aware of in order to ensure that they get cleaned up properly. These are explained on the page removing-custom-class-instances.
